extendedInfo.description: Available on Android phones and tablets!Watch the most popular TV shows and movies from Korea, Taiwan, Japan, China and the rest of Asia! Explore a large selection of dramas, variety shows, music videos, feature films, documentaries and short films with the DramaFever app. Find all your favorites such as Boys Over Flowers, Shining Inheritance, Secret Garden, Fated to Love You, Autumn's Concerto and Coffee Prince. With new shows and episodes added every week, keep checking in to watch the latest hits!Premium Members can watch unlimited commercial-free video. FEATURESâ¢ Over 7,000 hours of videoâ¢ Professional English subtitlesâ¢ New episodes added within hours of broadcastâ¢ Access to the newest shows from Asiaâ¢ Manage your Queue and History right in the appâ¢ The most popular Korean, Taiwanese, Chinese and Singaporean dramasEnjoy the best entertainment from around the world!Become a fan of DramaFever on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/dramafeverFollow us on Twitter:http://twitter.com/DramaFever

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work AT ALL? on my Sony xperia ion
reviews.comment: Nothing loads whatsoever!!! All I see are adds and videos don\'t load. Seriously dramafever is disappointing me so much lately.... I guess its back to Viki!!!
reviews.author: Aisha Shire

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I like the shows and how my account keeps my place when I stop watching a video. I would love it if you supported Chromecast in the near future.
reviews.author: Sean Baker

reviews.title: Fix the Update
reviews.comment: The the last update won\'t let the video play. It was working great before, now it only plays two to five commercials without playing the episodes.Fix the last update!!! The updates have been getting worse. Please fix it! I\'m can\'t give it more stars, not very satisfying with all the declining updates
reviews.author: Lundy Kim

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Just downloaded this app cause i heard was awesome but doesn\'t play anything at all, if so just stupid commercials uninstalling
reviews.author: Daniela Reyes

reviews.title: Problems with the updated version
reviews.comment: This app used to be amazing, but after the last update, drama fever stopped working on my tablet. It won\'t load any of the videos. I want the older version back!!! Please fix it.
reviews.author: Ana Rivas

reviews.title: poor update
reviews.comment: ..everything\'s good and working in both of my s3 and tablet but not until after updating to the new version, it wont load the video anymore..and all im seeing are the advertisements..pls bring it back to the old one..i really like this app..
reviews.author: Miaka Ivy Cruz

reviews.title: Fix.
reviews.comment: Why  is buffering so severe? All my other videos work perfectly besides dramafever. It doesnt even let you skip parts and just turns black
reviews.author: SunHee Moon

reviews.title: New update not so good
reviews.comment: I don\'t know what happen. But I used to have the droid 4 with this app and now I have the droid 2. The app only plays commercials when I wanna see a show on my queue or continue watching. Please fix this issue
reviews.author: Luz Ozuna

reviews.title: New update
reviews.comment: I loved Dramafever until the latest update.  It doesn\'t go back to where I left off in an episode and makes me sit through all of the ads a second time when I go back into the episode.  Android user, HTC Rezound.  ***update*** Now, the player won\'t play any videos at all.   I\'ve delete DF.  I\'ve been using Viki, and it is a million times better. LibasaurusRex
reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann

reviews.title: FIX!!
reviews.comment: THE UPDATE IS A DISASTER!! IT ONLY PLAY ADS! ALWAYS ADS. IT WONT PLAY THE VIDEO. IT\'LL PLAY 3-5 ADS TSKTSK
reviews.author: Vardiitex Aragon

reviews.title: Amazing update!
reviews.comment: Love the new updates! Videos are finally in SYNC! ! Good quality!
reviews.author: SHARMINA FERDOUSHI

reviews.title: Horrible App
reviews.comment: Its so hard to use! Before the update I couldn\'t search for the dramas, after all it does it play adds nonstop. It sucks cause I want to watch my dramas!
reviews.author: Annie Soukhavong

reviews.title: Don\'t update your DF
reviews.comment: This app definite went downhill  with the last update.  Nothing works except the commercial videos.  I am not happy that I finally had to admit DF was down after watching 8 of them crappy commercials!
reviews.author: Lina Taira

reviews.title: Too buggy
reviews.comment: Has too many ads with no option to skip after second one. Force closes without warning. Does not resume video if trying to watch same episode. Almost feels as if program is designed to force close to make u watch more ads. Filters certain key words but has none for \"korean drama\".  Needs major improvement. Prefer viki app. Uninstall.
reviews.author: Angie Ma

reviews.title: It sucks
reviews.comment: Since i updated it wont let me watch anything. I had to force close every time. I uninstalled because it was frustrating. I use to like DF, but they really messed up with the last update.
reviews.author: demoiselle amour

reviews.title: Last update sucks !
reviews.comment: Was working great until last update now it doesn\'t play any episodes. Sucks cause I was almost finished with my drama now I won\'t know what happened! Please fix it ! ASAP
reviews.author: SaMaNtHa GoNzaLeZ

reviews.title: Update failure
reviews.comment: Just downloaded the update, and now app no longer works. T.T.  Please repair! Regret hitting that update button now...
reviews.author: Tracy Anderson

reviews.title: H
reviews.comment: Something\'s wrong with the everytime I try to play video it won\'t work on galaxy s2
reviews.author: Sarah Acolatse

reviews.comment: It\'ll play two or three ads perfectly in a row, and then the actual drama won\'t play at all. This really needs to be fixed. I don\'t mind watching ads, but i downloaded this app for  watching dramas, not ads.
reviews.author: Sabrina Heitor

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: The update make this app doesnt work properly on my phone anymore. Cannot pick episodes from my shows tab and many other problems.
reviews.author: John Phan
